column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: 莞贵人与沈贵人情同姐妹
column6: You two are like sisters to each other.

column3: 分一杯羹给自己的姐妹呢
column6:
When she is having the meat to herself,
how can she forget to share a bowl of the broth?

column3: 娘娘让嫔妾抄录女论语

column6:
Your Highness hopes the Analects for Women
will remind the harem of good manners.

column3: 嫉妒怨恨乃为女子德行之大亏
column6:
I do understand that jealousy and spite
are the gravest flaws in a woman's virtue.

Though I am dull-witted,
I won't tolerate flaws in my character.

Although you have no moral failings,
you can't expect the other concubines to be the same.

column3: 反复无常之事可是见得多了
column6:
Throughout all these years in the palace,
fickleness of the human heart has been a constant.

column3: 娘娘既让姐姐抄录女论语
column6: I thank Your Highness for the advice.

column3: 为的就是防止后宫争宠
column6:
Copying down Analects for Women
will caution us against strife and rivalries.

column3: 娘娘用心良苦 妹妹们一定谨遵
column6:
Your Highness's thoughtfulness is profound.
We will follow your instructions.

column3: 莞贵人这话听着真是舒服
column6: It is very pleasant to converse with Lady Sourire.

column3: 沈贵人与莞贵人待得久了
嘴皮子功夫也日渐伶俐了
column6:
And Lady Shen has learned from Lady Sourire
to better craft her words.
You two shouldn't be underestimated.

column3: 一大早的 给皇后请安
又说了这会子话 还真是乏了
column6: I'm tired from all the talking this morning.
We will go.
Now you know how it is.

I know how Consort Fleur is.
But Meizhuang, do you blame me?

column3: 若不是你 也会有旁人
column6: If it weren't you, there would be someone else.

column3: 若是旁人 我宁愿是你
column6: Instead of someone else, I'd rather it be you..

Between us, the other concubines
might harm me if they gain favor.
But Huan'er, you won't.
Meizhuang.

You are the only one I can trust
among so many in the palace.

column3: 终究不是一起长大的情分
column6:
We are friends with Lingrong
but it's not the same as growing up together.

column3: 若是连你我都不能相互扶持

column6:
How will we live through the decades to come
if we can't support each other?

column3: 姐姐 有些事虽非我意料
也并非我一力可以避免
column6:
Meizhuang, there have been events I couldn't
foresee and therefore prevent.

column3: 我与姐姐的情谊一如从前
column6:
No matter what the future holds,
our sisterhood will never change.

column3: 姐姐也莫要与我生分了
column6:
Even though I have gained favor from His Majesty,
I hope you won't feel distanced from me.

column3: 以你我的天资 得宠是意料中事
column6:
With the qualities we possess,
it's no surprise His Majesty favors you and me.

column3: 即便不能保证宠眷不衰
也要留住这性命 不能牵连族人
column6:
Our favor isn't guaranteed to last,
but we must keep our lives to protect our families.
(thunder rumbling)
Why are you awake?
I heard the rain outside.
Do you have something on your mind?
No.
Don't lie to me.
Your Majesty, I'm scared.
I'm here. There's nothing to be afraid of.
Your Majesty treats me so well.

column3: 皇上可否听过集宠于一身
column6:
Has Your Majesty ever heard that
the most beloved concubine is also the most resented?

column3: 怎么 有人难为你吗
column6: Did anyone give you trouble?

column3: 没有 没有人为难臣妾
column6: No, no one did.

column3: 雨露均沾 六宫祥和
才能延绵皇家子嗣与福泽
column6:
The rain falls evenly on every flower in the harem
so they can bear fruits and carry on Heaven's blessings.
I dare not be exclusively favored by Your Majesty.
What if I insist so?

column3: 六宫妃嫔与前朝盘根错节
column6: The harem is inextricably intertwined with the court.
"Plucking a single hair affects the whole body."
Your Majesty is a sagacious emperor.
Sagacious?
It's been seven days.

column3: 若后宫成了怨气所钟之地
column6:
If the harem becomes plagued by strife, Your Majesty
won't be at peace while governing state affairs.

Neglecting the other concubines could bring complaints
about the fickleness of Your Majesty's heart.

column3: 男儿凉薄 喜新忘旧
臣妾不能让皇上烦心 臣妾不忍
column6: I cannot let Your Majesty be troubled. I can't bear to.
All right.
Peace and grace to Imperial Mother.
Have a seat.
Thank you, Imperial Mother.
You seem to be in good spirits today.

column3: 最近服侍皇帝的人还乖巧吗
column6: Are you satisfied with the concubines serving you lately?

column3: 新得的莞贵人颇合儿子心意
column6:
Among the new concubines,
I've taken a liking to Noble Lady Sourire.

column3: 莞贵人 从前没听你提起过
column6:
Noble Lady Sourire?
I don't recall you mentioning her before.
She's the clever one who entered the palace last year.

column3: 原来一直病着 近来才好
column6: She was ill for a long time, but has recovered recently.
That's good.

column3: 就是身边有个贴心的人
column6: It's important that you have someone close to your heart.

column3: 到底还没有安定下来 娶个福晋
column6: Unlike Prince XVII. He still hasn't settled down with a wife.

column3: 这些日子没见他进宫来请安
column6: He hasn't been visiting for some days.
I wonder how he has been.

Imperial Mother, if you miss him,
I'll summon him to come at noon.
He is a filial son.

column3: 难免又会想起先帝在的时候
column6: But seeing him reminds me of his birth mother, Consort Serein.

column3: 他亲额娘舒妃专宠六宫
column6: Your father favored her exclusively, and she became the target of resentment and jealousy.

column3: 众妃怨妒的事 心里就会不痛快
column6: That always makes me feel unhappy.

column3: 皇额娘老了 空下来念想多
column6:
An old woman likes to chatter
when she's idle and overthinking.

column3: 皇额娘字字金言 儿子受教
column6: I benefit from your golden advice, Imperial Mother.
When you have time,
I'll send Lady Sourire here to seek your teaching.

column3: 这后宫里的女人啊 比花还多
column6: There are more ladies in the harem than there are flowers.

column3: 就像是开满了遍地的小花
column6: Noble Ladies are like the ubiquitous little wildflowers.

column3: 等她有了出息熬到嫔位

column6: I'll see her when she makes it to Concubine.
Certainly.

column3: 这两日皇额娘身子不好
column6:
Madam Sun, Imperial Mother has been feeling unwell.
Has Consort Fleur visited her?

column3: 华妃娘娘协理六宫不得空
起早皇后娘娘来看了太后
column6: Her Highness has been busy assisting in the palace affairs.
The Empress came this morning to serve medicine.

column3: 倒是昨儿丽嫔娘娘来过了
陪太后还唠了好一会儿磕呢
column6:
But Concubine Beauté was here yesterday
and stayed for quite a long talk.
Concubine Beauté.
(noticing the name tag for Concubine Beauté)
The writing on Concubine Beauté's name tag is illegible.
Make a new one.

column3: 就别随着送来让皇上翻牌子了
column6: Her name tag won't be sent in for a few days.
(touching the name tag of Lady Sourire)
Peace to Consort Astuce.

column3: 小厦子 你怎么来了
column6: Xiao-Xiazi, what brought you here?

column3: 皇上的御驾正往长春宫来
column6: Your Highness, His Majesty is on the way to your palace.
So I came here to notify Your Highness.
His Majesty is coming?
Is His Majesty really?

column3: 快 快把这个收拾了
column6: Yes.
Quickly, clean up here.
And over there.

- Ouch!
- Your Highness.
Your Highness, please be careful.
Such a shambles, how can I greet His Majesty?

column3: 皇上的脾性娘娘还不了解吗
column6:
Your Highness has served His Majesty all these years.
You know His Majesty inside and out.

column3: 这皇上都大半年没来了
column6: His Majesty hasn't visited for almost a year.

column3: 不知怎么现在 说来就来了呢
column6: Why is he coming all of a sudden?
Is Your Highness not happy?

column3: 快去 给我拿件衣裳
column6: I am. I am.
Go get a dress for me.

column3: 皇上最喜欢本宫穿粉色的了
column6: The pink one. His Majesty likes me in pink.

- Go quickly.
- Yes, Your Highness.

column3: 还愣着干什么 快给我梳妆啊

column6:
- Don't just stand there. Do my hair!
- Yes, Your Highness.

column3: 对了 快把三阿哥给我叫来
column6: Wait, go send for the Third Prince.

column3: 娘娘 皇上难得过来

column6:
Your Highness, His Majesty is coming to see you.
You should spend time talking to him.

column3: 您还怎么和皇上说体己话呢
column6:
How can you have an intimate conversation
if the Third Prince is here?

column3: 是啊 这孩子说话毛毛躁躁的
column6: That's true. That child's speech is so coarse.
He might upset His Majesty again.

column3: 别叫了 快 快梳妆

column6:
- Never mind, do my hair.
- Yes.
Allow me to take my leave.
Your Highness, please take a break and have some bird's nest.

column3: 皇上今儿还是翻的她的牌子吗
column6: Did His Majesty select her again?
His Majesty went to visit Consort Astuce.
Really? Her?
Anyone is good, as long as it's not Lady Sourire.
What hour is it now?

column3: 时间还早 天刚擦黑
column6: The night just began to fall.

His Majesty was hoping that Lady Shen
could learn about bookkeeping.
I will teach her carefully.
Go bring Lady Shen here.
Yes.

The candles are dazzling bright.
Put out a few for me.
Yes.

column3: 皇上今儿已经翻了齐妃的牌子
column6: My Lady, don't wait up.

His Majesty has selected Consort Astuce's name tag
and went to the  Palace of Eternal Spring.
That's just as well.

column3: 像是高兴 又像是不高兴
column6: It sounds like you are happy but also upset, My Lady.
I'm confused as well.

column3: 可他真的不来 我却高兴不起来
column6:
I was hoping His Majesty would not come today,
but I feel unhappy when he doesn't.

column3: 沈贵人好歹也是大家闺秀

column6:
I didn't expect an educated daughter of a respectable family
to write with such a poor hand.

column3: 烛火太暗了 嫔妾实在看不清楚

column6:
The candlelight was dim and I couldn't see very well.
I hope Your Highness can forgive me.

column3: 自然知道宫中开销庞大
column6:
You understand the colossal amounts of spending
from copying the account book.

As the head of the concubines,
I have to set an example of frugality.

column3: 况且本宫听闻 若写得真好

column6:
I believe that the greatest scribes can
write beautifully even with their eyes closed.

column3: 贵人的托词未免牵强了点
column6: The lighting is not a sufficient excuse.
I ... will make another copy for Your Highness.

column3: 你抄去吧 本宫打个盹
column6: Go ahead. I will have a doze.

Songzhi, the light is too bright.
Blow out two more candles.
Yes.

column3: 臣妾站着伺候皇上就行了
column6: Have a seat.

I'm all right to stand by Your Majesty.
I'm not tired.

column3: 你挡着朕的光了 朕怎么看书啊
column6: You're blocking the light. How can I read?
The light...

column3: 皇上 夜里看书伤眼睛
喝杯菊花茶 醒神的
column6:
Your Majesty, chrysanthemum tea can help
relieve eye strain from reading at night.

column3: 你不是才让朕喝了参汤吗
column6: You just brought me ginseng tea.
I forgot... Your Majesty.

column3: 皇上 三阿哥又长高了
column6: Your Majesty, the Third Prince has grown taller.

column3: 都成年了 还长高啊
column6: He's already reached adulthood, and still growing?
Oh, I mean, he grew stronger.

column3: 每天都在猎场上练着呢
column6:
He listened to Your Majesty,
and goes to the hunting ground every day.

column3: 三阿哥日日都记在心里
column6: The Third Prince follows Your Majesty's guidance strictly.

column3: 但愿吧 朕也希望他能记得
column6: I hope he does remember what I said.

column3: 三阿哥每天都看书到深夜里
column6: He does, he studies late every night,

column3: 天不亮就起来练习骑射和马术
column6: and rises before dawn to practice horseback archery.

column3: 每次臣妾看到三阿哥的时候

column6: I say to him every time I see him:

column3: 你可千万要听你皇阿玛的话呀
column6: "Hongshi, you must listen to your Father;
You must live up to his expectations as his eldest son;

column3: 将来为你皇阿玛分忧的担子

column6: I hope you can share some of your Father's burden in the future."

column3: 弘时的耳朵听得都起茧子了
column6: Listening to all those words must have worn out his ears,
and mine too.

column3: 你就没有别的话教你儿子吗
column6: Do you not have something else to say to your son?
Yes, I ...

column3: 这身衣服不好看 以后别穿了
column6:
The dress doesn't look good on you.
Don't wear it again.

column3: 皇上最喜欢臣妾穿粉色了
column6: Your Majesty, I remember you saying you like me in pink.

column3: 粉色娇嫩 你如今几岁了
column6:
Pink is a delicate color.
It's not for your age.
Does Your Majesty think I'm old?
I'm just being honest.

column3: 你穿湖蓝 宝石绿要合身份得多
column6:
Lake blue and emerald green are
much more appropriate for your status.
Don't stay up late.
Where is Your Majesty going?
Back to the Hall of Mental Cultivation.
Your Majesty ... Your Majesty ...

column3: 你说 齐妃久不见皇上
column6:
After so long, Consort Astuce must be
very happy to see His Majesty.

column3: 小主 别想那么多了
column6: Don't overthink, My Lady.
You should rest early.

column3: 雨潇潇兮洞庭 烟霏霏兮黄陵
column6:
"Rain pours over Lake Dongting;
mist clouds over Temple Huangling."

column3: 望夫君兮不来 波渺渺而难升
column6:
"My eyes pine for my husband but see him not;
I cannot rise above the haze over the ruffled water."
My Lady, don't play this song.

column3: 这首曲子叫湘妃怨 不吉利呀
column6: It's bad luck to play "The Lament of the Xiang River Concubines."

column3: 湘妃怨 宫中女子的爱恨
column6: The Lament of the Xiang River Concubines.

Concubines' love can't draw attention,
let alone their lament.

column3: 还不是我自己要他去的
column6: Why should I even lament? I asked him to go.
Stop.

column3: 皇上 咱们是回养心殿呢

column6: Is Your Majesty going back or to the Palace of Earthly Honor?
To the Palace of Pearl Jade.
Stop.
Put down the sedan.
It's "The Lament of the Xiang River Concubines."
I don't know music, Your Majesty.

"I can distinctly hear the clouds of sorrow pouring rain;
As though the winds also lament a man who won't return."

column3: 朕不在 她心里难过
column6:
[quoted from another poem
"Listening to The Lament of the Xiang River Concubines"]
She's sad when I'm not with her.
Your music disquiets my heart.
Peace and grace to Your Majesty.
Rise.
What brings Your Majesty here?

column3: 朕今儿总算是尝到滋味了
column6:
"Pale and haggard grows the yearner for his lover."
I learned what that feels like today.

column3: 皇上不是在齐妃那儿吗
column6: Did Your Majesty not visit Consort Astuce?
I did pay her a visit.

column3: 走过来见今儿的月色好

column6:
I saw the beautiful moonlight on my way back,
and wondered what you were doing.

column3: 这样好的琴声 幸好朕没有错过
column6: Fortunately, I didn't miss your wonderful zither playing.

column3: 皇上再这么说 臣妾无地自容了
column6:
If I accept Your Majesty's flattery,
there will be no place left for me to stand.
How can a lofty emperor take to eavesdropping?
How bold of you!
You'll play another song as punishment.

column3: 皇上这么过来 齐妃会难受的
column6: Consort Astuce must feel sad that Your Majesty left.

column3: 你舍得推朕去旁人那儿吗
column6: Would you not feel sad if I stayed with her?
I have agreed that Your Majesty is a sagacious emperor.
I will be sagacious tomorrow.
Tonight, I will be foolish once more.

Then I'll be a virtuous concubine tomorrow
and entreat Consort Astuce's forgiveness.

column3: 四郎 想听什么曲子
column6:
Si Lang, what do you want to hear?
["The fourth son", it's an endearment to call one's husband by birth order]
What did you just call me?
I misspoke, Your Majesty.

column3: 你这样唤朕 朕很喜欢
column6: No, I like it when you call me that.

column3: 你的闺名是甄嬛 小字是什么
column6:
Your name is Zhen Huan.
What is the milk name your family calls you?
I don't have one.

column3: 那朕就叫你嬛嬛 好不好
column6: Then can I call you Huan Huan?
Huan Huan.
(yawning)
You have finished?

Your Highness, I made two copies of each book
in compensation for my poor handwriting.
Please take a look, Your Highness.

column3: 时候不早了 你先回去吧
column6: The hour is late. You shall leave now.

column3: 本宫看完自会告诉你的
column6: I will let you know after I read through them.
Yes, I bid Your Highness goodbye.

column3: 华妃娘娘分明是为难小主

column6: Consort Fleur was clearly making things difficult for you.

column3: 又故意把灯点得那么暗
column6:
The account book was full of numbers,
and she dimmed the lights down.
Your eyes were red after writing the two copies.
What can I do? She's Consort Fleur.

column3: 小主就不能告诉皇上吗
column6: Why don't you tell His Majesty, My Lady?

column3: 她借着皇上的旨意要调教我
column6: She is teaching me in the name of His Majesty's behest.
Even if His Majesty helps me with this,

column3: 以后还能让我学着协理六宫吗
column6: will he let me continue to learn about palace management?

column3: 既然得不偿失 我就不会做
column6: I won't do it. I'd lose more than I gain.
I'm just worried about you, My Lady.

column3: 得了 我也过了困劲了
column6: All right, I don't feel tired anymore.
The Thousand Carp Pond is in the vicinity.

column3: 听说皇上在那儿添了灯
column6: Let's go for a walk.

His Majesty had more lamps lit up there
so we can see the red fish at night.

Translators: The Magpie Bridge Brigade 鹊桥小队翻译组🐡
Support our volunteers: magpiebridgebrigade.cn
We are running out of fish food.
Xiao-Shi, go fetch some more.
Yes.
Look at that, My Lady.

I've finally found you, My Lady.
I've been looking around.

column3: 姑姑怎么夜深了还出来
是不是娘娘有什么吩咐
column6:
What brings you out at night, Madam?
Is there anything I can do for Her Highness?

column3: 娘娘说徽州有几方好墨进贡来
column6:
Her Highness was going to reward you
with the ink offered as tribute from Anhui Province.

column3: 本想赐给小主 谁知小主走得快
column6: But you were already out of sight.

column3: 那采月去随姑姑去一趟
column6: Then, Lunar will go with you, Madam.

- But you'll be here alone, My Lady.
- You'll be back shortly.
Help! H... Help!
Help!
His Majesty the Emperor.
I bow in respect before Your Majesty.
Rise.

- I thank Your Majesty.
- How is Meizhuang?

column3: 回莞贵人的话 沈贵人已无大碍
column6: My Lady, Noble Lady Shen is out of danger.

column3: 只是呛水 受了惊吓

column6: But she is still unconscious due to shock and inhaling water.

column3: 只要沈贵人照方调养身子
column6:
We have written prescriptions for her to
recover quickly from the aftereffects.

column3: 便会很快康复 只是

column6: However ...

column3: 是 只是小主受惊不小
column6: Don't mince your words.

column3: 怕是要好好调养一段日子
column6:
